places.name: Budapest
places.description: Capital of Hungary, rich in thermal baths and historical landmarks.

places.name: Tallinn
places.description: Capital of Estonia, featuring a beautifully preserved medieval old town.

places.name: Sofia
places.description: Capital of Bulgaria, known for Alexander Nevsky Cathedral and historic neighborhoods.

places.name: Podgorica
places.description: Capital of Montenegro, located near rivers and surrounded by mountains.

places.name: Skopje
places.description: Capital of North Macedonia, featuring the old bazaar and city monuments.

places.name: Athens
places.description: Capital of Greece, home to the Acropolis and ancient historical sites.

places.name: Belgrade
places.description: Capital of Serbia, known for Kalemegdan Fortress and vibrant old town.

places.name: Bratislava
places.description: Capital of Slovakia, featuring the historic old town and the Danube riverfront.

places.name: Ljubljana
places.description: Capital of Slovenia, charming old town with the Ljubljanica River running through it.

places.name: Zagreb
places.description: Capital of Croatia, known for historic city center and cultural landmarks.

places.name: Berlin
places.description: Capital of Germany, full of history from the Brandenburg Gate to the Berlin Wall memorial.

places.name: Bern
places.description: Capital of Switzerland, historic old town and federal buildings.

places.name: Vienna
places.description: Capital of Austria, known for classical music, palaces, and coffee houses.

places.name: Bucharest
places.description: Capital of Romania, with the Palace of Parliament and historic city streets.

places.name: Warsaw
places.description: Capital of Poland, rebuilt Old Town and modern city landmarks.

places.name: Prague
places.description: Capital of Czechia, famous for Prague Castle, Charles Bridge, and Old Town Square.

places.name: Monaco
places.description: Principality capital, famous for the harbor, palace, and casino.

places.name: Rome
places.description: Capital of Italy, home to the Colosseum, Roman Forum, and Vatican City.

places.name: Stockholm
places.description: Capital of Sweden, with Gamla Stan, Vasa Museum, and archipelago views.

places.name: Copenhagen
places.description: Capital of Denmark, featuring Nyhavn, Tivoli Gardens, and historic canals.

places.name: Vaduz
places.description: Capital of Liechtenstein, small but charming with nearby alpine scenery.

places.name: Paris
places.description: Capital of France, Eiffel Tower, Louvre Museum, and historic streets.

places.name: Brussels
places.description: Capital of Belgium, Grand Place, Atomium, and chocolate delights.

places.name: San Marino
places.description: One of the world's smallest countries, known for its medieval architecture and hilltop views.
